rules_text:
Dash {1}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it’s returned from the battlefield to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token. A copy of a dashed spell is also dashed.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Mini robots/Microbots, robot animals

Mechanical Uniqueness — dash + storm
